references.paper_title: PointNet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many point cloud understanding methods, introducing PointNet, a pioneering deep learning architecture for processing point cloud data directly.

references.paper_title: Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: This work significantly advanced point cloud processing by introducing PointNet++, which extends PointNet with hierarchical feature learning for capturing local structures at various scales.

references.paper_title: Dynamic graph cnn for learning on point clouds
references.reason: This paper introduced Dynamic Graph CNN, a powerful method for capturing dynamic local semantic features and dependencies within point clouds, improving upon previous static graph-based approaches.

references.paper_title: DG-PIC: Domain generalized point-in-context learning for point cloud understanding
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it is another work by the same authors, introducing an innovative approach for domain generalization in multi-task point cloud understanding.

references.paper_title: Explore in-context learning for 3d point cloud understanding
references.reason: This work is highly relevant as it introduces the In-Context Learning (ICL) paradigm for point cloud understanding, a concept similar to the continual test-time adaptation (COTTA) explored in the main paper.
